message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $80, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. I can do $75
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to meet you at $80
I'm not willing to go above $78, that's my final offer
